resources.string:
BCRfm is a not-for-profit community radio station to serve Ballina and its outskirts.
We are a voice for the community, run by the community.
A dedicated committee of young and old who are passionate about radio and
the place they call home. We want to renew the vibrancy of Ballina and showcase what
it and its outskirts has to offer.
Radio Schedule
We plan to broadcast from 9am to 11pm daily for a period of 30 days as determined by
the BAI. Program schedule will be 60% speech content and 40% music content in any one weekly schedule.
Send Us Your Music!
BCRfm loves music and we aim to get as much great and varied music on the airwaves as possible.
BCRfm is committed to showcasing music from Irish composers, singer songwriters and local bands across the programme schedule, with emphasis on those who would not yet have reached national fame.
We will regularly feature demo discs from local groups, individual artists and have a one hour weekly programme dedicated to local bands and musicians.
Local bands, choirs both adult and childrenâ€™s will on occasion play live in the studio. We are happy to air recorded music, live sessions, gig recordings or interviews, feel free to get in touch.
If you have a specific genre with a specific show in mind, contact us!
